Text:
How can it be uncompressed if it is in FLAC format?
It is lossless compression, but still compressed,
therefore  size of 946 MiB instead of DVD about 4400 MiB.
"if you like the movie" ??
It seems 10 flac files, no movie ?
Thanks very much in any case !
Google DVD-Audio - This isn't a video. It's a high definition music format. The original disc is audio, not video and so I wouldn't (and couldn't) have posted a movie.
